import{useEffect}from'react';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import userStore from'../store/userStore';export var useHistorys=function useHistorys(){var history=useHistory();var pushStart=function pushStart(){history.push('/');};var pushMain=function pushMain(){history.push('/main');};var pushSignUp=function pushSignUp(){history.push('/signup');};var pushLogin=function pushLogin(){history.push('/login');};var pushFindPW=function pushFindPW(){history.push('/findpw');};var pushMyPage=function pushMyPage(){history.push('/mypage');};var pushChatPage=function pushChatPage(){history.push('/chat');};var pushPostPage=function pushPostPage(){history.push('/post');};var pushLoggedUser=function pushLoggedUser(){if(userStore.isSignIn){history.push('/main');}else{return;}};useEffect(function(){pushLoggedUser();},[userStore.isSignIn]);// eslint-disable-line
return{pushStart:pushStart,pushMain:pushMain,pushSignUp:pushSignUp,pushLogin:pushLogin,pushFindPW:pushFindPW,pushMyPage:pushMyPage,pushChatPage:pushChatPage,pushPostPage:pushPostPage};};
